## Quality Checklist
<!-- Ensure these are completed before requesting review -->
- [ ] Code follows conventional commit format
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined
- [ ] Error handling is comprehensive
- [ ] Logging is appropriate (not too verbose, not too sparse)
- [ ] Code is properly commented
- [ ] No console.log statements left in code
- [ ] No TODO comments without associated issues
- [ ] Dependencies are justified and secure
- [ ] Code passes all linting rules
- [ ] Code passes all formatting rules
